    • Method Detail

      • getAllRoofs

        public static List<Roof> getAllRoofs()
                              throws CustomException
        Get all roofs. This method calls the database with a prepared statement to request an arraylist of all elements from the roofs table.
        Returns:
        An arraylist of all roofs objects.
        Throws:
        CustomException - if SQl syntax contains errors, can't connect to database, the connection class isn't found or the closeStatement() method can't close the connection.

      • getRoofById

        public static Roof getRoofById(int id)
                        throws CustomException
        Get roof by id. This method calls the database with a prepared statement to request an element from the roofs table by it's 'roof_id'.
        Parameters:
        id - The id attached to the roof. Should not be out of index bounds.
        Returns:
        A roof object with requested id.
        Throws:
        CustomException - if SQl syntax contains errors, can't connect to database, the connection class isn't found or the closeStatement() method can't close the connection.

      • updateRoof

        public static void updateRoof(int id,
                              String name,
                              String oldname)
                       throws CustomException
        Update roof. This method calls the database with a prepared statement to request an update on a specific roof. Replacing the current name with the modified at the id, using transaction in case of conflicts.
        Parameters:
        id - The id og the roof. Should not be null.
        name - The modified name. Should not be null.
        oldname - The current name. Should not be null.
        Throws:
        CustomException - if SQl syntax contains errors, can't connect to database, the connection class isn't found or the closeStatement() method can't close the connection.
